Default.Text:
**Endpoint Advisor is running and your go-to hub for comms and alerts!**
This app is currently in BETA. Please submit feedback to endpointengineering@test.com. Thank you.
Default.Details: Windows OS Updates will start deploying on **[red]October 15[/red]**. Please make sure your computer is plugged into power and connected to the network. A computer restart will be required.

Default.Title: macOS Updates Available
Default.Text: Go to System Settings → General → Software Update.
Default.Details: Save your work before installing updates.
